Description: Figma is the leading collaborative design tool for building meaningful products. Seamlessly design, prototype, develop, and collect feedback in a single platform.

List: Perfect Tool Stack for UX/UI Designers

Review: Once I'm ready to prototype and test my High Fidelity designs I rely on figma's Native prototyping capabilities for most projects it generally covers most scenarios for web and mobile applications however for projects that need really Advanced prototyping capabilities for example emulator relating the real iPhone camera or even emulating a dynamic experience where we have Dynamic text Pop through depending on what values we put into an input field now protopi would be my pick then.
Description: Create interactive, realistic prototypes that work like the actual digital product. Ideal for designers prototyping for mobile, desktop, web, or IoT. Try for free.

List: Perfect Tool Stack for UX/UI Designers

List: Perfect Tool Stack for UX/UI Designers

Review: When it comes to surveys and like Gathering user feedback I recommend typeform overall it is a very well designed comprehensive and detailed product for setting up surveys there are a ton of pre-made templates that you could just start with right away and I can also create Dynamic sequences and the experience filling out a survey feels quite nice if you ask me its interactive interface feels more premium and offers a better experience for the user as well.

List: Perfect Tool Stack for UX/UI Designers

Description: Bring harmony to design delivery

List: Perfect Tool Stack for UX/UI Designers

List: 8 UI Kit & Design System Figma Plugins 2023
Title: Tokens Studio for Figma (Figma Tokens)
Review: The first plugin is Token Studio, more for advanced designers. In Figma, when creating UI kits or design systems, what you're essentially creating are base tokens for colors, typography, spacing, buttons. Beyond base tokens, there's a layer called contextual tokens, which adds clarity for developers and designers on the usage of these tokens in various contexts. Token Studio is a tool that manages this entire process, simplifying the task of handling base and contextual tokens in a design system.
Description: A figma plugin allowing you to apply, manage and sync design tokens from Figma to code, formerly known as Figma Tokens.

List: 8 UI Kit & Design System Figma Plugins 2023
Title: Batch Styler | Figma Community
Review: The second plugin, Batch Styler, is ideal in agency environments where UI kits or design systems are reused across different projects. It's designed to streamline the process of updating font styles throughout a project. This tool becomes handy when you need to change fonts across a UI kit or design system. Instead of manually updating each font style, Batch Styler allows you to select all your fonts and update the styles in bulk, thereby saving time and ensuring consistency across your project.
Description: Change multiple text and color styles at once!  Need to change values of multiple (text and color) styles at once but don't want to go through the process of changing each text style on its own?  With Batch Styler you can do just that! No matter if 2 or 30 text styles, changing from Inter to Robo...

List: 8 UI Kit & Design System Figma Plugins 2023
Title: Zeplin | Figma Community
Review: Zeplin, the third plugin, is well-known beyond just being a UI kit or design system management tool. It handles the entire handover process, which includes UI kits, developer documentation, and design systems. In Zeplin, you can upload a project directly from Figma, which then allows developers to access all the necessary design details and measurements. It automatically detects and imports global styles from your Figma project, aiding in the creation of a comprehensive style guide and ensuring that design handovers to developers are smooth and detailed.
Description: Document designs. Manage workflows. Build products faster. Building products at scale — across functions, locations, and lifecycles — is a multi-level challenge. Zeplin unites your team around your design vision, with unique workflows proven to increase production speed and quality.  Clarify desi...

List: 8 UI Kit & Design System Figma Plugins 2023
Title: Simple Sort | Figma Community
Review: Simple Sort is the fourth plugin and is particularly useful for organizing and sorting Figma variants. It automatically adjusts or reorders the variants based on criteria like size (large, medium, small) and type (primary, secondary, link, tertiary, outlined). This tool is invaluable for managing large sets of design components, helping to keep them clean and systematic.
Description: Automatically applies a basic structure to your component sets (variants) which can be customised to your liking.  ---  Manual Mode  Rows & Columns Decide whether the variants for a particular property should be arranged horizontally or vertically.  Order of values You can rearrange each of the v...

List: 8 UI Kit & Design System Figma Plugins 2023
Title: Measure | Figma Community
Review: Measure is a plugin ideal for documentation, especially useful for Design Systems and preparing designs for developer handover. It allows annotating dimensions and metadata details directly onto components. For instance, it can show the dimensions of a header or detail the specifications of a button, including its variant details, width, height, color, border radius, and opacity, streamlining the documentation process
Description: A plugin for easy measurement of sizes. The simple user interface allows you to add easily redlines for heights and widths, fill spaces, measure distances between elements and more.  How to use? Click on the "About" menu item in the upper right corner for more instructions.

List: 8 UI Kit & Design System Figma Plugins 2023
Title: Design Lint | Figma Community
Review: Design Lint is used to find and fix errors related to global styles or elements not attached to global styles. It scans the canvas to identify issues like incorrect border radius and other inconsistencies. This plugin is helpful for tidying up, cleaning, or managing a design system or UI kit, as it quickly identifies errors and offers solutions to streamline the process.
Description: Find and fix errors in your designs.  Design Lint is a plugin that finds missing styles within your designs. It's perfect for fixing errors in your Design System or designs before handoff.  Because Design Lint doesn't try and manage your library, there's no logging in or signing up for accounts. ...

List: 8 UI Kit & Design System Figma Plugins 2023
Title: Style Organizer | Figma Community
Review: Style Organizer checks if everything in a design is associated with a global style, ensuring no random hex codes or colors are used. It scans pages and identifies all the colors used, associating them with their respective style names. This tool is crucial for maintaining consistency in design systems, ensuring all elements are linked to defined global styles.
Description: Text Styles Added!  Merge and link all color & text styles in the page: - Overall usage assessment - Group elements with the same appearance together - Merge and link to selected style - Select all elements with the style - Make all possible fix automatically with a single click  Things to notice...

List: 8 UI Kit & Design System Figma Plugins 2023
Title: Contrast | Figma Community
Review: The final plugin, Contrast, focuses on color contrast, a key aspect of accessibility in design. It scans designs to determine the color contrast grade (AAA, AA) of elements like buttons against their backgrounds, ensuring they meet accessibility standards. This tool is essential when working in sectors like health, education, or government, where maintaining high contrast standards is critical.
Description: Contrast makes it easy to check the contrast ratios of colors as you work. Select a layer and Contrast will immediately look for the color directly behind your selection and serve up the contrast ratio along with passing and failing levels from the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG). If ...

List: 5 INCREDIBLE Websites for Designers (You'll love these)
Title: Tailwind CSS - Rapidly build modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.
Review: Tailwind CSS is being talked about by every designer. Upon landing on the homepage, they have a clear and concise heading that explains what the product is about. Aside from the concise copywriting, it has an extremely consistent and aesthetically pleasing visual style. Tailwind CSS lets the product speak for itself. Throughout the homepage, every time they explain what the product is about and how to use it, they visually show you the code and its application to your own project.
Description: Tailwind CSS is a utility-first CSS framework for rapidly building modern websites without ever leaving your HTML.

List: 5 INCREDIBLE Websites for Designers (You'll love these)
Title: Winden: Business Banking for Entrepreneurs
Review: Windon CSS has visually differentiated itself from traditional banks. Instead of corporate and boring colors, they chose something more modern, combining a confident and rich navy blue with soft pastel light colors, reminiscent of stride. The visuals are rigorously consistent, and the copywriting is clean and concise. Their illustrations communicate clearly and are high-end.
Description: Winden is a business bank designed to help you make more money. Earn unlimited rewards, free wire transfers, and more.

Description: New generation of superyachts: all the charm of a navigation inspired by nature.

List: Top 5 AMAZING Websites Every Web & UI Designer Must Visit
Title: Linear – A better way to build products
Review: The first website for inspiration is linear.app. Upon landing, you'll notice it's beautifully designed, likely with good user experience. The top header has glistening stars, indicating an update on the changelog. The transitions are nice and slow, and the UI is subtly interactive without overdoing animations. Linear, a project management tool, is showcased through transitions highlighting what the product is about. The color scheme is immersive, and attention to detail, like custom-designed keyboards, demonstrates exceptional design quality.
Description: Linear streamlines issues, sprints, and product roadmaps. It’s the new standard for modern software development.

List: Top 5 AMAZING Websites Every Web & UI Designer Must Visit
Title: Starlight — The Financial OS for Web3 Teams
Review: The second website is starlight.money, featuring a techy, galaxy-inspired theme, likely based on its name. The micro-interactions of pulsating icons and shooting stars are engaging. It’s a financial OS for web 3 teams, with a nice preview of the app and subtle details like a glowing grid behind designs. Icons are consistent, adding to the design's premium feel. The site's detailed attention, like light-up interactions on hover, showcases its high design quality.
Description: Starlight offers everything your company needs to operate in the crypto economy from setting up wallets, to buying crypto, to tracking expenses.

List: Top 5 AMAZING Websites Every Web & UI Designer Must Visit
Title: Amie - Joyful productivity
Review: The third website is a calendar app, characterized by a fun, vibrant theme. Its introduction is engaging, capturing attention effectively. An intriguing feature is the testimonials or feedback from Twitter displayed interactively on the right side. The site uses sound effects to enhance engagement as you reach new breakpoints. Its UI-focused design contributes to a good user experience, emphasizing clear headlines and showcasing product features.
Description: Meet the all-in-one calendar. Schedule time for todos, events, and contacts with joy. Try it for free!

List: Top 5 AMAZING Websites Every Web & UI Designer Must Visit
Title: Sketch
Review: The fourth website, sketch.com, is noted for its polished design. Despite its reduced popularity among UI designers, its visual branding, consistent spacing, and overall polish are commendable. The micro-interactions serve a purpose, showcasing features like collaborative work in Sketch. The design is supported by strong visualizations and interactions, with each pixel feeling considered. A unique UI touch is the small timeline design in the updates section, offering an interactive and visually appealing way to explore product updates.
Description: Sketch is the all-in-one platform for digital design — with collaborative design tools, prototyping and developer handoff. Get started for free.

List: Top 5 AMAZING Websites Every Web & UI Designer Must Visit

The futuristic consistency in design elements adds to the site’s immersive quality.
